column4: Is there anyway of reinstalling grub from windows 7 without a live cd or maybe adding ubuntu into win7 boot loader to load ubuntu?
do you have a dual boot install?
I may have the answer for you if you're still around

k.. I'll take a chance anyway.. download the ubuntu live cd iso.. install virtualbox in your win7.. load ubuntu there and use the built in tools to create a livecd on a usb stick.. boot to the newly created stick and fix grub.. no cd involved..
